title: NEIST Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Project Associate I Posts
description: North East Institute of Science and Technology (NEIST) has declared the latest jobs notifiction for various Project Associate I Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech, M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the NEIST Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address below. If you are looking for more, he...
